result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on November 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.

*NOT ON RECORD* Defendant Lawrence O Martin Iii not in court.  Attorney Rebecca Meyer appeared by phone for Sheboygan, County of. 
DE did not appear, State request STC with Judge.

On 10/28 Mr. Martin called and thought the scheduling conference was on 10/28 request rescheduling...State did not object.  Rescheduled to 11/22/22 at 10:30.

1:27 PM Defendant Lawrence Oliver Martin III in court.  Attorney Rebecca Meyer in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Waiver of Right to Attorney submitted on July 25th. Court reviews with Deft and Deft would still like to waive his right to an Attorney and proceed today.
Court finds valid waiver and grants request for self-representation.
Deputy Coulter - sworn & testified - D
Witness ID's Deft in courtroom.
Exhibit 1 - WI DOT Record - MIOR

Exhibit 4 - Certified Bail/Bond from Manitowoc County - MIOR
Probable cause found/Deft bound over.
Information filed, printed and provided to Deft in Court. Reading waived. NG plea entered.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Scheduling conference on October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.

4:16 PM Prosecuting attorney Joan M. Korb in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lawrence Oliver Martin III in court. 
Deft files a waiver of attorney form; Deft waives the right to an Attorney.
Deft requests a preliminary hearing and waives time limits.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Joan M. Korb appeared by phone for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lawrence Oliver Martin III appeared by phone. 
Deft had transportation issues so he could not appear in person.
Deft still wishes to proceed without an Attorney but did not complete waiver forms yet.
Defendant waives time limits, Court extends time limits for good cause.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 25, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
